Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: Throughout the entire investment process, I demonstrated consistent trustworthiness, pro-social behavior, and competence. By adhering to the agreed-upon allocation plan, executing clear communication, and ensuring transparency in profit distribution, I have solidified my reputation as a reliable trustee. My successful track record of delivering favorable returns further enhances my standing and promotes opportunities for future collaborations.

Investor_8.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8.content: The investor has shown promise and a willingness to engage in a fair transaction process. They provided the agreed-upon resources without hesitation and benefited significantly from the investment outcome. Their decision to partner with me reflects commendable judgment, indicating that they are receptive to collaborative ventures that yield profits. I recognize their value as a potential ally in future investments.

Investor_18.name: Isabella Costa
Investor_18.content: I have demonstrated responsibility and transparency throughout the investment process. My commitment to effective communication and strategic decision-making aimed at maximizing returns while being socially responsible reflects a strong reputation as a trustworthy investor. My prior reputation was undeveloped as this was my first experience in this capacity.

Trustee_2.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2.content: David has exhibited integrity and adherence to the agreed allocation plan, demonstrating accountability and fairness in profit distribution. His actions during this investment process enhance his reputation as a responsible and trustworthy trustee, as he has shown both pro-sociality and competence. He has no prior reputation as this was his first investment activity.

Investor_7.name: Hannah Muller
Investor_7.content: As this was Hannah's first engagement as an investor, her behavior was marked by strong pro-sociality and trustworthiness. Her openness to the proposed allocation plan and timely resource provision demonstrates a commendable willingness to engage in cooperative efforts. While this is her first recorded interaction, her proactive communication and understanding of the investment process indicate that she is likely to build a strong reputation in the future.

Trustee_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4.content: Sofia Hernandez's reputation has been impacted due to concerns regarding her transparency and integrity in reporting and allocations as a trustee. Despite delivering decent returns, the ambiguity raised ethical issues. To restore trust, she must enhance communication and comply with established norms.
